sentences.english: Many stock markets around the world exist a pre-opening period before trading actually occurs.
sentences.chinese: 股市開市前議價期存在於世界一些主要證券交易所。

sentences.english: The bargaining power of HKU in determining the terms will be larger.
sentences.chinese: 港大在與教授議價的能力較高。

sentences.english: That calculation gives China enormous bargaining power.
sentences.chinese: 這種推斷讓中國有了巨大的議價能力。

sentences.english: Plus you must sometimes deal with the stressful intricacies of bargaining.
sentences.chinese: 更不用說有時你還要面對艱難的議價。

sentences.english: Dale and Becky are negotiating the price with Bo, the man who rents Jet Skis.
sentences.chinese: 戴爾和貝齊正跟海邊租水上摩托車的阿寶議價。

sentences.english: What is the name of your company, I can give you the agreement price.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司名稱是什麼，我可以給你協議價。

sentences.english: A fifth bargaining chip could be to alter the schedule of payments.
sentences.chinese: 第五個可以用來議價的籌碼是改變原訂的付款日期。

sentences.english: The rights of both bargainers and customers are unclear and unprotected, " Wang Kaiyu, a sociologist warned.
sentences.chinese: 議價者和購物者的權益還不清晰，也不受保護。

sentences.english: Is it any discount? Our company has the agreement with you.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司名稱是什麼，我可以給你協議價。

sentences.english: The topics about collective bargaining process are critical to management-labor relations.
sentences.chinese: 集體議價過程堪爲勞資關係之重要議題。

sentences.english: Gay men often find they have weaker bargaining power.
sentences.chinese: 同性戀男子發現，自己的議價能力往往更弱。

sentences.english: Enjoy Corporate Rate, RMB 30laundry crddit available on the first day of stay.
sentences.chinese: 享受商務協議價，入住首日贈送30元洗衣費。

sentences.english: However, the bargaining may be more frequent so that the process of iron ore pricing more transparent.
sentences.chinese: 但更爲頻繁的議價可能使鐵礦砂定價過程更爲透明。

sentences.english: Of course, the listing price is always negotiable as well.
sentences.chinese: 當然，房屋售價永遠是可以議價談判的。

sentences.english: The contractual price will be greatly affected by the cost of materials used for the products.
sentences.chinese: 生產資料的成本會對協議價影響很大。

sentences.english: OK, the agreement price is RMB400.
sentences.chinese: 好的，給貴司的協議價是400塊。

definition: to quote a price/seller's first offer
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
(of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
parking spot/unloading point/garage place/stand for taxi
